page.title: 02INTRODUCTION CONTINUED
page.content: There are few facilities in the area. Most people have to travel three or more miles to find the nearest doctor, dentist, hospital or large shop. There is a flourishing community life for those who wish to take part. Warninglid is situated in the south west of our area around a crossroad. It is a peaceful village with a population of mixed ages which is remaining stable. There is a pub, a school but no shops and for some older people transport is a problem.A bus runs every 2 hours. Slaugham is a quiet village enclosed by farmland. Most of the houses are old and situated along the high street.There is a church, a pub and two lakes. There are two interesting objects in Slaugham_a white telephone box and an old water pump outside the former post office.
